Articles.Content:
I feel like It would prevent trololoz from downrating threads for no reason.

Like the small modders usually get downrated.

The ideas I have are.

Disable thread rating until post 150

Disable thread rating until a mod approves them to use thread rating

Remove thread rating completely

I think its a good idea.

Edited August 16, 2014 by Dooz
Thread rating does absolutely nothing. Don't even bother checking it.
For some reason It bothers me. I don't know why but, it just does..

Lol a troll down rated this thread how ironic.

But seriously action should be taken.

Threads have ratings?

No seriously I've been here over a year and I just found this out.

How about just disable it so everybody can ignore them like I do?

Some people like to use the function, some tend to ignore it and a handful are apparently bothered by it

I agree the function adds very little to the forum, I'll discuss removing it.

It's a way to show approval of a thread without spamming it with "+1" replies, and it's more public than giving rep. It also is a way to give negative feedback without being harsh or personal. I agree, though, that many members don't use it properly.

LOL at this thread's one star rating, someone just couldn't resist.
Well, I'd hate to see it go as that would mean the thread for my military series would lose it's 5 stars xD
Never even noticed thread rating till this post, okay back to forgetting its there.
